item.description:
**LOCATION CHANGED to BOSTON BILLIARDS**

We're heading to Boston Billiards* for some cue and pocket action. We'll have a couple of tables reserved for the pool sharks, but plenty of non-billiards hanging out as well. Boston Billiards has some great appetizers and a full bar which no doubt we'll be taking advantage of...



So look no further if you're seeking like-minded progressives to play pool with in Boston, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while avoiding the 8 ball, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

Show up at 7PM to settle in, get a drink and order some yummy appetizers. Pool tables are reserved from 7:30-9:30PM.

Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the 'Message Board' and are encouraged to suggest and co-host events. Sign up at www.sojust.org. It's free to join!

*Sorry, this event is 21+

Directions can be found: here (Best bet is to take the Green Line to Fenway or Kenmore and then walk towards Fenway Park.)

Food and drink menus: here
item.name: Billiards for Justice
